xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor

Interface TargetInterceptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension<MessagingContainer>, Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTargetInterceptor, LinkContractInterceptor, LiteralEncryptionInterceptor, ReadOnlyInterceptor, RefInterceptor, VariablesInterceptor

    public interface TargetInterceptor
extends Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    Interceptor that is executed when an operation is executed on an XDI statement or an XDI address.
    Author:
    markus

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface xdi2.messaging.container.Extension

        Extension.InitPriorityComparator, Extension.ShutdownPriorityComparator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XDIAddress targetAddress(XDIAddress targetXDIAddress, Operation operation, Graph operationResultGraph, ExecutionContext executionContext)
      Replaces or skips the target address before it is executed.
      XDIStatement targetStatement(XDIStatement targetXDIStatement, Operation operation, Graph operationResultGraph, ExecutionContext executionContext)
      Replaces or skips the target statement before it is executed.

      • Methods inherited from interface xdi2.messaging.container.Extension

        clearDisabled, clearDisabledForMessage, clearDisabledForMessageEnvelope, clearDisabledForOperation, getInitPriority, getShutdownPriority, init, setDisabled, setDisabledForMessage, setDisabledForMessageEnvelope, setDisabledForOperation, shutdown, skip

    • Method Detail

      • targetAddress

        XDIAddress targetAddress(XDIAddress targetXDIAddress,
                         Operation operation,
                         Graph operationResultGraph,
                         ExecutionContext executionContext)
                  throws Xdi2MessagingException
        Replaces or skips the target address before it is executed.
        Parameters:
        targetXDIAddress - The target address.
        operation - The operation to process.
        messageResult - The message result.
        executionContext - The current execution context.
        Returns:
        The new target address, or the original target address, or null to skip.
        Throws:
        Xdi2MessagingException

      • targetStatement

        XDIStatement targetStatement(XDIStatement targetXDIStatement,
                             Operation operation,
                             Graph operationResultGraph,
                             ExecutionContext executionContext)
                      throws Xdi2MessagingException
        Replaces or skips the target statement before it is executed.
        Parameters:
        targetXDIStatement - The target statement.
        operation - The operation to process.
        messageResult - The message result.
        executionContext - The current execution context.
        Returns:
        The new target statement, or the original target statement, or null to skip.
        Throws:
        Xdi2MessagingException
